name: Finance Tools
description: Tools for budgeting, investing, accounting, and financial management

tools.name: Mint
tools.description: Personal finance management tool for budgeting, expense tracking, and credit monitoring.

tools.name: QuickBooks
tools.description: Accounting software for small businesses to manage finances, invoicing, and payroll.

tools.name: Robinhood
tools.description: Commission-free investing platform for stocks, ETFs, options, and cryptocurrency.

tools.name: YNAB (You Need A Budget)
tools.description: Zero-based budgeting software that helps you assign every dollar and break the paycheck-to-paycheck cycle.

tools.name: PayPal
tools.description: Digital payment platform for online transactions, money transfers, and business payments.

tools.name: Stripe
tools.description: Payment processing platform for online businesses with developer-friendly APIs.

tools.name: Personal Capital
tools.description: Wealth management and financial planning tool with investment tracking and advisory services.

tools.name: Xero
tools.description: Cloud-based accounting software for small businesses with invoicing, expenses, and reporting.

tools.name: Coinbase
tools.description: Cryptocurrency exchange platform for buying, selling, and storing digital currencies.

tools.name: Expensify
tools.description: Expense management software that automates expense reporting and reimbursement processes.
